title: Any new maps in the near future?
body: Just wondering if Riot was thinking or planning on making a new map for League of Legends. Getting pretty bored of only being able to play Howling Abyss, Summoners Rift and Twisted Treeline. I think it would be pretty unique to be able to play in different lands / worlds or something. Just spit balling here but something new would be pretty cool and exciting. Please no hate just expressing my opinion and wondering if others might be thinking the same thing.

replies.body: they wont because they are rito and don't cater to there fan-base and just enjoy money.
Why? Just the huge Champion pool brings in so much variety into the game. When Im bored of lol I start playing a new champ
